title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4063.3 - Sale, transfer of claimed horse
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4063.3 - Sale, transfer of claimed horse

State Regulations

If a horse is claimed such horse shall not be sold or
transferred to anyone wholly or in part, except in a selling or claiming race, for a period of 30 days from date of claim, nor shall such horse, unless
reclaimed, remain in the same stable or under the control or management of such
horse's former owner or trainer for a like period, nor shall such horse race
elsewhere until after the close of the meeting at which such horse was
claimed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4063.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
